blocks.name: bnj60
blocks.content: Well-founded recursion, part 1 of 3. The proof has been taken from Chapter 4 of Don Monk's notes on Set Theory. See ~ http://euclid.colorado.edu/~~monkd/setth.pdf . (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bnj60(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wfn(c2, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, cv(s0), wss(c-bnj14(cv(s1), c1, c0), cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cop(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), c-bnj14(cv(s1), c1, c0))))
  -| wceq(c5, cab(s2, wrex(s0, c3, wa(wfn(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s1)), cfv(c6, c4)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
} = {
  bnj1422(c2, c1, w-bnj15(c0, c1))
  sylibr(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wfun(c2), wfun(cuni(c5)))
  sylancr(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wfun(cuni(c5)), wral(hs0, c5, wfun(cv(hs0))), wral(hs0, c5, wral(hs1, c5, wceq(cres(cv(hs0), cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1)))), cres(cv(hs1), cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1))))))))
  bnj1497(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c5, c3, c1, c0, c4, c6)
  ralrimiva(hs0, c5, w-bnj15(c0, c1), wral(hs1, c5, wceq(cres(cv(hs0), cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1)))), cres(cv(hs1), cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1)))))))
  ralrimiv(hs1, c5, wa(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(cres(cv(hs0), cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1)))), cres(cv(hs1), cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1))))))
  3expia(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), c5), wceq(cres(cv(hs0), cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1)))), cres(cv(hs1), cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1))))))
  bnj1311(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c5, cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1))), c3, c4, c6)
  bnj1383(hs0, hs1, c5, cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1))), wa(wral(hs0, c5, wfun(cv(hs0))), wral(hs0, c5, wral(hs1, c5, wceq(cres(cv(hs0), cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1)))), cres(cv(hs1), cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1)))))))), wral(hs0, c5, wfun(cv(hs0))))
  biid(wral(hs0, c5, wfun(cv(hs0))))
  eqid(cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1))))
  biid(wa(wral(hs0, c5, wfun(cv(hs0))), wral(hs0, c5, wral(hs1, c5, wceq(cres(cv(hs0), cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1)))), cres(cv(hs1), cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1)))))))))
  funeqi(c2, cuni(c5))
  bnj1498(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w-bnj15(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c5)))
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c6)
  diff.cin.s(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1)))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cin.s(s1, cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1)))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, cv(hs1))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.w(wral(hs0, c5, wfun(cv(hs0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bnj60(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ (c0[_FrSe]c1 → c2[Fn]c1)
  ⊣ c3 = { s0 |(s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ s0, _pred(s1, c1, c0)⊆ s0))}
  ⊣ c4 = < s1,(s2 |` _pred(s1, c1, c0))>
  ⊣ c5 = { s2 | ∃(s0 ∈ c3,(s2[Fn]s0 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ s0,(s2 ` s1)=(c6 ` c4))))}
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c5
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c6)
} = {
  bnj1422(c2, c1, c0[_FrSe]c1)
  sylibr(c0[_FrSe]c1, Fun(c2), Fun(⋃ c5))
  sylancr(c0[_FrSe]c1, Fun(⋃ c5), ∀(hs0 ∈ c5, Fun(hs0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c5, ∀(hs1 ∈ c5,(hs0 |`(dom(hs0)⋂ dom(hs1)))=(hs1 |`(dom(hs0)⋂ dom(hs1))))))
  bnj1497(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c5, c3, c1, c0, c4, c6)
  ralrimiva(hs0, c5, c0[_FrSe]c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c5,(hs0 |`(dom(hs0)⋂ dom(hs1)))=(hs1 |`(dom(hs0)⋂ dom(hs1)))))
  ralrimiv(hs1, c5, (c0[_FrSe]c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), (hs0 |`(dom(hs0)⋂ dom(hs1)))=(hs1 |`(dom(hs0)⋂ dom(hs1))))
  3expia(c0[_FrSe]c1, hs0 ∈ c5, hs1 ∈ c5, (hs0 |`(dom(hs0)⋂ dom(hs1)))=(hs1 |`(dom(hs0)⋂ dom(hs1))))
  bnj1311(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c5, (dom(hs0)⋂ dom(hs1)), c3, c4, c6)
  bnj1383(hs0, hs1, c5, (dom(hs0)⋂ dom(hs1)), (∀(hs0 ∈ c5, Fun(hs0))∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c5, ∀(hs1 ∈ c5,(hs0 |`(dom(hs0)⋂ dom(hs1)))=(hs1 |`(dom(hs0)⋂ dom(hs1)))))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c5, Fun(hs0)))
  biid(∀(hs0 ∈ c5, Fun(hs0)))
  eqid((dom(hs0)⋂ dom(hs1)))
  biid((∀(hs0 ∈ c5, Fun(hs0))∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c5, ∀(hs1 ∈ c5,(hs0 |`(dom(hs0)⋂ dom(hs1)))=(hs1 |`(dom(hs0)⋂ dom(hs1)))))))
  funeqi(c2, ⋃ c5)
  bnj1498(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(c0[_FrSe]c1)
  diff.hs1.w((c0[_FrSe]c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5))
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c6)
  diff.cin.s(s0, dom(hs0), dom(hs1))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cin.s(s1, dom(hs0), dom(hs1))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.w(∀(hs0 ∈ c5, Fun(hs0)))
}

blocks.name: bnj1514
blocks.content: Technical lemma for ~ bnj1500 . This lemma may no longer be used or have become an indirect lemma of the theorem in question (i.e. a lemma of a lemma... of the theorem). (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bnj1514(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cdm(cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cab(s2, wa(wss(cv(s2), c4), wral(s1, cv(s2), wss(c-bnj14(cv(s1), c4, c5), cv(s2))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cop(cv(s1), cres(cv(s0), c-bnj14(cv(s1), c4, c5))))
  -| wceq(c0, cab(s0, wrex(s2, c3, wa(wfn(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cdm(cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2)))), wceq(c3, cab(s2, wa(wss(cv(s2), c4), wral(s1, cv(s2), wss(c-bnj14(cv(s1), c4, c5), cv(s2)))))))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cdm(cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2)))), wceq(c2, cop(cv(s1), cres(cv(s0), c-bnj14(cv(s1), c4, c5)))))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cdm(cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2)))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  bnj937(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cdm(cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2))))
  bnj593(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cdm(cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2))), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wfn(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2)))))
  sylib(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wex(s2, w3a(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wfn(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2))))), wrex(s2, c3, wa(wfn(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2))))))
  bnj1436(s0, c0, wrex(s2, c3, wa(wfn(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2))))))
  bnj133(s2, wrex(s2, c3, wa(wfn(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2))))), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wfn(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2)))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wa(wfn(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2))))))
  df-rex(s2, c3, wa(wfn(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2)))))
  3anass(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wfn(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2))))
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wfn(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2)))), wral(s1, cdm(cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2))), wral(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2))))
  simp3(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wfn(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2))))
  raleqdv(s1, cdm(cv(s0)), cv(s2), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wfn(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2)))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wfn(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wral(s1, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2))), wceq(cdm(cv(s0)), cv(s2)))
  fndm(cv(s0), cv(s2))
  diff.wral.s(s2, s1, cdm(cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2)))
  diff.cdm.s(s2, cv(s0))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(c1, c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c1, c2)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: bnj1518
blocks.content: Technical lemma for ~ bnj1500 . This lemma may no longer be used or have become an indirect lemma of the theorem in question (i.e. a lemma of a lemma... of the theorem). (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bnj1518(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
  -| wceq(c0, cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, cv(s0), wss(c-bnj14(cv(s1), c1, c2), cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cop(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), c-bnj14(cv(s1), c1, c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, cab(s2, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wfn(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s1)), cfv(c5, c3)))))))
  -| wceq(c6, cuni(c4))
  -| wb(w1, wa(w-bnj15(c2, c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  -| wb(w0, w3a(w1, wcel(cv(s2), c4), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cv(s2)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wal(s0, w0)), wceq(c0, cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, cv(s0), wss(c-bnj14(cv(s1), c1, c2), cv(s0)))))))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wal(s0, w0)), wceq(c3, cop(cv(s1), cres(cv(s2), c-bnj14(cv(s1), c1, c2)))))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wal(s0, w0)), wceq(c6, cuni(c4)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wal(s0, w0)), wb(w1, wa(w-bnj15(c2, c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  nf5ri(s0, w0)
  nfxfr(s0, w0, w3a(w1, wcel(cv(s2), c4), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cv(s2)))))
  nf3an(s0, w1, wcel(cv(s2), c4), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cv(s2))))
  nfv(s0, w1)
  nfcri(s0, s2, c4)
  nfcxfr(s0, c4, cab(s2, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wfn(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s1)), cfv(c5, c3)))))))
  nfab(s0, s2, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wfn(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s1)), cfv(c5, c3))))))
  nfre1(s0, c0, wa(wfn(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s1)), cfv(c5, c3)))))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(s1), cdm(cv(s2))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), cdm(cv(s2)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bnj1518(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∀(s0, w0))
  ⊣ c0 = { s0 |(s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ s0, _pred(s1, c1, c2)⊆ s0))}
  ⊣ c3 = < s1,(s2 |` _pred(s1, c1, c2))>
  ⊣ c4 = { s2 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(s2[Fn]s0 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ s0,(s2 ` s1)=(c5 ` c3))))}
  ⊣ c6 = ⋃ c4
  ⊣ (w1 ↔(c2[_FrSe]c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))
  ⊣ (w0 ↔(w1 ∧ s2 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ dom(s2)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → ∀(s0, w0)), c0 = { s0 |(s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ s0, _pred(s1, c1, c2)⊆ s0))})
  a1ii((w0 → ∀(s0, w0)), c3 = < s1,(s2 |` _pred(s1, c1, c2))>)
  a1ii((w0 → ∀(s0, w0)), c6 = ⋃ c4)
  a1ii((w0 → ∀(s0, w0)), (w1 ↔(c2[_FrSe]c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)))
  nf5ri(s0, w0)
  nfxfr(s0, w0, (w1 ∧ s2 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ dom(s2)))
  nf3an(s0, w1, s2 ∈ c4, s1 ∈ dom(s2))
  nfv(s0, w1)
  nfcri(s0, s2, c4)
  nfcxfr(s0, c4, { s2 | ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(s2[Fn]s0 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ s0,(s2 ` s1)=(c5 ` c3))))})
  nfab(s0, s2, ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(s2[Fn]s0 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ s0,(s2 ` s1)=(c5 ` c3)))))
  nfre1(s0, c0, (s2[Fn]s0 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ s0,(s2 ` s1)=(c5 ` c3))))
  nfv(s0, s1 ∈ dom(s2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s1, dom(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
}

blocks.name: bnj1519
blocks.content: Technical lemma for ~ bnj1500 . This lemma may no longer be used or have become an indirect lemma of the theorem in question (i.e. a lemma of a lemma... of the theorem). (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bnj1519(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))), wal(s1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cab(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c2), wral(s0, cv(s1), wss(c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3), cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c5, cop(cv(s0), cres(cv(s2), c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))
  -| wceq(c6, cab(s2, wrex(s1, c4, wa(wfn(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wral(s0, cv(s1), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)), cfv(c1, c5)))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(c6))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))), wal(s1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))))), wceq(c4, cab(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c2), wral(s0, cv(s1), wss(c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3), cv(s1)))))))
  a1ii(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))), wal(s1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))))), wceq(c5, cop(cv(s0), cres(cv(s2), c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3)))))
  nf5ri(s1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))))
  nfeq(s1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3)))))
  nffv(s1, c0, cv(s0))
  nffv(s1, c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfop(s1, cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3)))
  nfcv(s1, cv(s0))
  nfres(s1, c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))
  nfcxfr(s1, c0, cuni(c6))
  nfuni(s1, c6)
  nfcxfr(s1, c6, cab(s2, wrex(s1, c4, wa(wfn(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wral(s0, cv(s1), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)), cfv(c1, c5)))))))
  nfab(s1, s2, wrex(s1, c4, wa(wfn(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wral(s0, cv(s1), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)), cfv(c1, c5))))))
  nfre1(s1, c4, wa(wfn(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wral(s0, cv(s1), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)), cfv(c1, c5)))))
  nfcv(s1, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))
  diff.c-bnj14.s(s1, cv(s0), c2, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm bnj1520(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))), wal(s1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cab(s2, wa(wss(cv(s2), c2), wral(s0, cv(s2), wss(c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3), cv(s2))))))
  -| wceq(c5, cop(cv(s0), cres(cv(s1), c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))
  -| wceq(c6, cab(s1, wrex(s2, c4, wa(wfn(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wral(s0, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cfv(c1, c5)))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(c6))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))), wal(s1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))))), wceq(c4, cab(s2, wa(wss(cv(s2), c2), wral(s0, cv(s2), wss(c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3), cv(s2)))))))
  a1ii(wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))), wal(s1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))))), wceq(c5, cop(cv(s0), cres(cv(s1), c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3)))))
  nf5ri(s1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))))
  nfeq(s1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3)))))
  nffv(s1, c0, cv(s0))
  nffv(s1, c1, cop(cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))))
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfop(s1, cv(s0), cres(c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3)))
  nfcv(s1, cv(s0))
  nfres(s1, c0, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))
  nfcxfr(s1, c0, cuni(c6))
  nfuni(s1, c6)
  nfcii(s1, hs0, c6)
  bnj1317(hs0, s1, c6, wrex(s2, c4, wa(wfn(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wral(s0, cv(s2), wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cfv(c1, c5))))))
  nfcv(s1, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c2, c3))
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.c-bnj14.s(s1, cv(s0), c2, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bnj1520(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` < s0,(c0 |` _pred(s0, c2, c3))>)→ ∀(s1,(c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` < s0,(c0 |` _pred(s0, c2, c3))>)))
  ⊣ c4 = { s2 |(s2 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ s2, _pred(s0, c2, c3)⊆ s2))}
  ⊣ c5 = < s0,(s1 |` _pred(s0, c2, c3))>
  ⊣ c6 = { s1 | ∃(s2 ∈ c4,(s1[Fn]s2 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ s2,(s1 ` s0)=(c1 ` c5))))}
  ⊣ c0 = ⋃ c6
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` < s0,(c0 |` _pred(s0, c2, c3))>)→ ∀(s1,(c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` < s0,(c0 |` _pred(s0, c2, c3))>))), c4 = { s2 |(s2 ⊆ c2 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ s2, _pred(s0, c2, c3)⊆ s2))})
  a1ii(((c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` < s0,(c0 |` _pred(s0, c2, c3))>)→ ∀(s1,(c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` < s0,(c0 |` _pred(s0, c2, c3))>))), c5 = < s0,(s1 |` _pred(s0, c2, c3))>)
  nf5ri(s1, (c0 ` s0)=(c1 ` < s0,(c0 |` _pred(s0, c2, c3))>))
  nfeq(s1, (c0 ` s0), (c1 ` < s0,(c0 |` _pred(s0, c2, c3))>))
  nffv(s1, c0, s0)
  nffv(s1, c1, < s0,(c0 |` _pred(s0, c2, c3))>)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfop(s1, s0, (c0 |` _pred(s0, c2, c3)))
  nfcv(s1, s0)
  nfres(s1, c0, _pred(s0, c2, c3))
  nfcxfr(s1, c0, ⋃ c6)
  nfuni(s1, c6)
  nfcii(s1, hs0, c6)
  bnj1317(hs0, s1, c6, ∃(s2 ∈ c4,(s1[Fn]s2 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ s2,(s1 ` s0)=(c1 ` c5)))))
  nfcv(s1, _pred(s0, c2, c3))
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.c-bnj14.s(s1, s0, c2, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm bnj1501(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cab(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c1), wral(s0, cv(s1), wss(c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0), cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c5, cop(cv(s0), cres(cv(s2), c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))
  -| wceq(c6, cab(s2, wrex(s1, c4, wa(wfn(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wral(s0, cv(s1), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)), cfv(c3, c5)))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c6))
  -| wb(w0, wa(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  -| wb(w1, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c6), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s2)))))
  -| wb(w2, w3a(w1, wcel(cv(s1), c4), wceq(cdm(cv(s2)), cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)

  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  bnj1459(s0, c1, w-bnj15(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))), w0)
  bnj1397(s2, w0, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))))
  bnj593(s2, w0, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))), w1)
  bnj1209(s2, c6, w0, w1, wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s2))))
  bnj1405(s2, c6, cv(s0), cdm(cv(s2)), w0)
  syl6eleq(cv(s0), ciun(s2, c6, cdm(cv(s2))), cdm(c2), w0)
  eleqtrrd(cv(s0), cdm(c2), c1, w0)
  simprbi(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), w-bnj15(c0, c1))
  bnj832(w0, wceq(cdm(c2), c1), w-bnj15(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  syl(w-bnj15(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c2), c1), wfn(c2, c1))
  fndm(c2, c1)
  eqtri(cdm(c2), ciun(s2, c6, cdm(cv(s2))), cdm(cuni(c6)))
  dmeqi(c2, cuni(c6))
  bnj1400(s2, hs0, c6)
  bnj1317(hs0, s2, c6, wrex(s1, c4, wa(wfn(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wral(s0, cv(s1), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)), cfv(c3, c5))))))
  bnj1397(s1, w1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))))
  bnj593(s1, w1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))))), w2)
  bnj1521(s1, c4, w1, w2, wceq(cdm(cv(s2)), cv(s1)))
  bnj836(w1, wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cdm(cv(s2)), cv(s1))), w0, wcel(cv(s2), c6), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s2))))
  bnj31(s1, c4, wcel(cv(s2), c6), wceq(cdm(cv(s2)), cv(s1)), wfn(cv(s2), cv(s1)))
  bnj1299(s1, c4, wcel(cv(s2), c6), wfn(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wral(s0, cv(s1), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)), cfv(c3, c5))))
  bnj1436(s2, c6, wrex(s1, c4, wa(wfn(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wral(s0, cv(s1), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)), cfv(c3, c5))))))
  fndm(cv(s2), cv(s1))
  bnj1518(s1, s0, s2, c4, c1, c0, c5, c6, c3, c2, w1, w0)
  eqtr4d(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0)))), cfv(c3, c5), w2)
  bnj835(w2, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, c5)), w1, wcel(cv(s1), c4), wceq(cdm(cv(s2)), cv(s1)))
  eqtrd(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, c5), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)), w1)
  bnj1502(c2, cv(s0), cv(s2), w1)
  bnj1294(s0, cdm(cv(s2)), w1, wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)), cfv(c3, c5)))
  bnj836(w1, wral(s0, cdm(cv(s2)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)), cfv(c3, c5))), w0, wcel(cv(s2), c6), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s2))))
  bnj1514(s2, s0, s1, c6, c3, c5, c4, c1, c0)
  fveq2d(c3, cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))), c5, w2)
  syl6eqr(cop(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))), c5, cop(cv(s0), cres(cv(s2), c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0))), w2)
  opeq2d(cv(s0), cres(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0)), cres(cv(s2), c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0)), w2)
  bnj1503(c2, c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0), cv(s2), w2)
  bnj835(w2, wfun(c2), w1, wcel(cv(s1), c4), wceq(cdm(cv(s2)), cv(s1)))
  bnj835(w1, wfun(c2), w0, wcel(cv(s2), c6), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s2))))
  bnj832(w0, wfun(c2), w-bnj15(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  bnj930(c2, c1, w-bnj15(c0, c1))
  bnj60(s1, s0, s2, c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, c3)
  bnj835(w2, wss(cv(s2), c2), w1, wcel(cv(s1), c4), wceq(cdm(cv(s2)), cv(s1)))
  bnj836(w1, wss(cv(s2), c2), w0, wcel(cv(s2), c6), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s2))))
  syl6sseqr(cv(s2), c2, cuni(c6), wcel(cv(s2), c6))
  elssuni(cv(s2), c6)
  sseqtr4d(c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0), cdm(cv(s2)), cv(s1), w2)
  bnj1294(s0, cv(s1), w2, wss(c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0), cv(s1)))
  bnj836(w2, wral(s0, cv(s1), wss(c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0), cv(s1))), w1, wcel(cv(s1), c4), wceq(cdm(cv(s2)), cv(s1)))
  bnj1517(s1, c4, wral(s0, cv(s1), wss(c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c0), cv(s1))), wss(cv(s1), c1))
  eleqtrd(cv(s0), cv(s1), cdm(cv(s2)), w2)
  bnj835(w2, wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s2))), w1, wcel(cv(s1), c4), wceq(cdm(cv(s2)), cv(s1)))
  simp3bi(w1, wcel(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s2))), w0, wcel(cv(s2), c6))
  simp3bi(w2, wceq(cdm(cv(s2)), cv(s1)), w1, wcel(cv(s1), c4))
  bnj1519(s0, s1, s2, c2, c3, c1, c0, c4, c5, c6)
  bnj1520(s0, s2, s1, c2, c3, c1, c0, c4, c5, c6)
  diff.w-bnj15.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)

blocks.pretty:
thm bnj1501(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (c0[_FrSe]c1 → ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c2 ` s0)=(c3 ` < s0,(c2 |` _pred(s0, c1, c0))>)))
  ⊣ c4 = { s1 |(s1 ⊆ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ s1, _pred(s0, c1, c0)⊆ s1))}
  ⊣ c5 = < s0,(s2 |` _pred(s0, c1, c0))>
  ⊣ c6 = { s2 | ∃(s1 ∈ c4,(s2[Fn]s1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ s1,(s2 ` s0)=(c3 ` c5))))}
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c6
  ⊣ (w0 ↔(c0[_FrSe]c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  ⊣ (w1 ↔(w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c6 ∧ s0 ∈ dom(s2)))
  ⊣ (w2 ↔(w1 ∧ s1 ∈ c4 ∧ dom(s2)= s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  bnj1459(s0, c1, c0[_FrSe]c1, (c2 ` s0)=(c3 ` < s0,(c2 |` _pred(s0, c1, c0))>), w0)
  bnj1397(s2, w0, (c2 ` s0)=(c3 ` < s0,(c2 |` _pred(s0, c1, c0))>))
  bnj593(s2, w0, (c2 ` s0)=(c3 ` < s0,(c2 |` _pred(s0, c1, c0))>), w1)
  bnj1209(s2, c6, w0, w1, s0 ∈ dom(s2))
  bnj1405(s2, c6, s0, dom(s2), w0)
  syl6eleq(s0, ⋃(s2 ∈ c6, dom(s2)), dom(c2), w0)
  eleqtrrd(s0, dom(c2), c1, w0)
  simprbi(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c0[_FrSe]c1)
  bnj832(w0, dom(c2)= c1, c0[_FrSe]c1, s0 ∈ c1)
  syl(c0[_FrSe]c1, dom(c2)= c1, c2[Fn]c1)
  fndm(c2, c1)
  eqtri(dom(c2), ⋃(s2 ∈ c6, dom(s2)), dom(⋃ c6))
